name: Thaw
description:
It's cold, too cold!

But thankfully this cute lil fireball is here to warm things up. Destroy the 5 snowmen placed throughout the map so she can bring spring to the world!

Created in 2 weeks for My First Game Jam, this game is my first step into 3d modelling in blender and game design in godot.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

Left Click or E to breathe fire

UPDATES

1.0.1 - Added a death plane under the level so you no longer fall forever if you find a way out
